explains: adj. （围绕）某主题的；为表达一种想法而创造的
wordGroup: basic concept 基本概念；本义
design concept 设计理念；设计构思；设计原理
marketing concept 市场营销观念
general concept 一般概念；概念知识
key concept 关键概念；基本概念；主要概念
concept art 概念艺术；概念创作图
operational concept 操作概念；作战原则
accounting concept 会计基础理论；会计学概念；会计观念

sentences.en: Ten years on, the original concept was wearing well.
sentences.cn: 十年过去，最初的观念依然适用。

sentences.en: The concept of saturation marketing makes perfect sense.
sentences.cn: 饱和营销的概念很有道理。

sentences.en: It's not a question of some abstract concept of justice.
sentences.cn: 这不是一个有关正义的某一抽象概念的问题。
